item.title: [508]Basic cutting gems [pali]
item.dc:creator: @Manu0238 Manu0238
item.description:
@Manu0238 wrote:

Note change the emote of p.requestAnim everywhere to 885!!!
So it looks like this , i forgot to change it

p.requestAnim(885, 0);

Hey ,
Yesterday i started to add cutting gems to my server and i was thinking , why dont i add this to moparscape?
Well anyways here it is.

Difficultly : 1/10
Type: Copy and Paste
Credits: Manu0238
Base: Pali
Files: src -> palidino76 -> rs2 -> io -> packets -> ItemOnItem.java

Ok lets start ,
The only thing you need to do is copy this code and paste it into your ItemOnItem.java

//===========================================Crafting gems by Manu0238======================================== if (itemUsed == 1755 && usedWith == 1625 || itemUsed == 1625 && usedWith == 1755) { { p.requestAnim(885, 0);//Opal pi.deleteItem(p, 1625, 1); pi.addItem(p, 1609, 1); p.addSkillXP(99 ,12); p.clickDelay = 3; p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cut the gem."); } } if (itemUsed == 1755 && usedWith == 1619 || itemUsed == 1619 && usedWith == 1755) { { p.requestAnim(885, 0);//Ruby pi.deleteItem(p, 1603, 1); pi.addItem(p, 1603, 1); p.addSkillXP(678 ,12); p.clickDelay = 3; p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cut the Gem."); } } if (itemUsed == 1755 && usedWith == 1617 || itemUsed == 1617 && usedWith == 1755) { { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cut the gem."); if(p.skillLvl[12] > 43) { p.requestAnim(1248, 0);//Diamond pi.deleteItem(p, 1617, 1); pi.addItem(p, 1601, 1); p.addSkillXP(856 ,12); p.clickDelay = 3; } else { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You Need A Crafting Level Of 43 To cut this gem."); } } } if (itemUsed == 1755 && usedWith == 1621 || itemUsed == 1621 && usedWith == 1755) { { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cut the gem."); if(p.skillLvl[12] > 40) { p.requestAnim(1248, 0);//eme. pi.deleteItem(p, 1621, 1); pi.addItem(p, 1605, 1); p.addSkillXP(1234 ,12); p.clickDelay = 3; } else { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You Need A Crafting Level Of 40 To cut this gem."); } } } if (itemUsed == 1755 && usedWith == 6571 || itemUsed == 6571 && usedWith == 1755) { { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cut the gem."); if(p.skillLvl[12] > 67) { p.requestAnim(1248, 0);//onyx pi.deleteItem(p, 6571, 1); pi.addItem(p, 6564, 1); p.addSkillXP(2374 ,12); p.clickDelay = 3; } else { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You Need A Crafting Level Of 67 To cut this gem."); } } } if (itemUsed == 1755 && usedWith == 1631 || itemUsed == 1631 && usedWith == 1755) { { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cut the gem."); if(p.skillLvl[12] > 55) { p.requestAnim(1248, 0);//d-stone pi.deleteItem(p, 1631, 1); pi.addItem(p, 1615, 1); p.addSkillXP(876 ,12); p.clickDelay = 3; } else { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You Need A Crafting Level Of 55 To cut this gem."); } } } if (itemUsed == 1755 && usedWith == 1623 || itemUsed == 1623 && usedWith == 1755) { { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cut the gem."); if(p.skillLvl[12] > 20) { p.requestAnim(1248, 0);//saphire pi.deleteItem(p, 1623, 1); pi.addItem(p, 1607, 1); p.addSkillXP(234 ,12); p.clickDelay = 3; } else { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You Need A Crafting Level Of 20 To cut this gem."); } } } //========================================End of Crafting gems========================

Bad comments and flame = remove
